pageContext.claim: “Amazon is just not on an even playing field. You know, they have a tremendous lobbying effort, in addition to having The Washington Post, which is, as far as I’m concerned, another lobbyist.”
pageContext.analysis: The Washington Post is not a lobbyist for Amazon. The chief executive of Amazon, Jeff Bezos, has owned The Post since 2013 as a personal investment. The two companies operate independently of each other. The leaders of The Post's newsroom and editorial page also operate independently of each other, and both have said Bezos does not influence their decisions.
